prompt_text: Turn on the Office WLED every day at 7:00 AM
automation_yaml:
id: 'office_wled_7am_on'
alias: Turn On Office WLED at 7 AM
description: "Turn on the Office WLED strip every day at 7:00 AM at ~70% brightness"
mode: single
trigger:
  - platform: time
    at: '07:00:00'
conditions: []
action:
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.wled
    data:
      brightness_pct: 70

questions.question_text: Could you clarify: Action 'turn' is vague - missing details: dim, brighten
